messages.body: Well I did accomplish one of my main goals in January - trading less (5-10x). I put on 8 trades. I did have some misses: $TSLA, $MNLO, $LX.

links.title: Opinion | The Energy Solution Latin America Needs
links.description: The good news is that the renewable energy sources like wind, solar and geothermal are abundant in Latin America and costs are declining rapidly.
